EmailTemplate.name: 18-TEPS-Public Sector-Email-APCO Email Invite-T0026B.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Are drones on your list of new public safety services?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Visit Nokia Booth at APCO 2018 Find out how new public safety digital services can help to raise the situational awareness and efficiency of your public safety teams APCO exhibition: August 06 - 07, 2018, Las Vegas, NV Drones, Video Surveillance, Bio-Vital Signs Monitoring, Noise Sensors… With the roll out of LTE for public safety and broadband IP networks, state & local public safety agencies will be able to benefit from a much richer set of services to improve their situational awareness, collaboration and overall efficiency. Come to Nokia booth #1841 to experience these services and discuss with us how to get the best of this digital evolution. Reserve your spot by filling our online form! We have a limited quantity of Free registration passes available. Register early to confirm your pass and also to reserve a demo tour. © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> · Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> · Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
